title: Episode 76 - Tibet - The Struggle For Heaven
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode, we explore the complex and fascinating history of Tibet in the early Cold War. We explore China's history with Tibet and its desire to incorporate Tibet into China. We also examine India's complex relationship with China over Tibet and the CIA's attempt to build an insurgency in the region.
